module: Module-level comment: The ROM_nlp_fir module functions as a ROM storing 48 predefined 80-bit coefficients for an FIR filter in NLP tasks. It maps a 6-bit address input (`addr`) to the corresponding coefficient, outputted via an 80-bit port (`dataout`). This mapping is realized through an `always@(*)` block accessing an indexed internal reg array (`nlp_fir`), directly linking `addr` to `dataout`.
